Signs and symptoms of a severe reaction to a transfusion include fever, chills, low blood pressure, and shock. (Shock is a life-threatening condition that occurs if the body isn't getting enough blood flow.)",NHLBI,Hemolytic Anemia
How to diagnose Hemolytic Anemia ?,"Your doctor will diagnose hemolytic anemia based on your medical and family histories, a physical exam, and test results.
